idea: ecoHQ was launched in January, 2021 to improve transparency/traceability in the conscious consumption space. ecoHQ facilitates strategic collaborations wherever possible to amplify the efforts of the right consumers, stakeholders and activists in the sustainability space, especially in advocacy and sensitization projects. We consult with businesses to connect them  to vendors, service providers, and other organisations to solve various challenges surrounding advocacy and solution-adoption in the Indian sustainability sector.
name: ecoHQ

idea:
RAJWADA AYURVED CENTER PRIVATE LIMITED was founded with the mission to take nature and Ayurveda to each and every home. The main motive of RAJWADA AYURVED CENTER PRIVATE LIMITED is to make people healthy as well as happy by providing authentic and genuine natural medicines and products delivered to your doorstep. Our herbal health products are the direct response to the ailments as well as disorders such as arthritis, diabetes, hypertension, asthma, sexual disorders, obesity, skin problem and many more problems which are adversely affecting our community.

RAJWADA AYURVED CENTER PRIVATE LIMITED’S herbal products are botanical nutritional supplements derived from plant sources that are typically used in an effort to maintain and improve health. Our range of herbal products is extensively used for treating various body and skin related ailments.

We specifically make medicines by following the ancient practice of Ayurveda. Our medicines have helped thousands of people to get healthier lives. Continuous Research & Development are the backbone of RAJWADA AYURVED CENTER PRIVATE LIMITED’S product and process development, testing methods and validation of efficacy of existing and new products
name: RAJWADA AYURVED CENTER PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Today, highly efficient control panel and switchgear applications are in huge demand across end – user segments such as industrial, construction (residential/commercial), power generation, and transmission and distribution (T&D) utilities. Growth in key sectors such as oil and gas, petrochemicals, steel, cement and telecom are the major growth drivers for control panel and switchgear industry. Planned investment across major infrastructures projects such as airports, metro rail, mono rail, industrial corridor are expected to drive the growth further.


A distribution board (also known as panel board, breaker panel or electrical panel) is a component of an electric supply system that divides an electrical power feed into subsidiary circuits, while providing a protective fuse or circuit breaker for each circuit in a common enclosure. Normally, a main switch, and in recent boards, one or more residual – current devices (RCD) or residual current breakers with over current protection (RCBO) are also incorporated.


Considering the above factors and to capitalize on the opportunities the Electrical Panel Manufacturing has on offer, the promoters of M/s. HEECOTECH ELECTRICALS PVT. LIMITED took a conscious management decision to set up an Electrical Panels Manufacturing unit at Lekhanagar in Patna, Bihar. Total Factory Building measuring 5000 sft for the proposed unit has already been acquired on leasehold basis.

About the Company

M/s. Heecotech Electricals (P) Limited is a pvt. Limited company incorporated on the 5th day of March 2021 and having its registered office at Kalyan-E, Thane, Maharastra- 421306. The company has been incorporated with the main object of setting up an electrical panels manufacturing unit to tap the huge market demand for the same.
name: HEECOTECH ELECTRICALS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: ValidChk is the brand name of Original Check Solutions Pvt Limited which was founded in the year 2018 by four veterans in their respective diverse areas of expertise but having a common observation, that there is an absence of an mechanism that can help consumers validate the authenticity of a person, place or product, instantaneously and without using any gadget beyond mobile phone.
name: ORIGINAL CHECK SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
